tryEditingRequest.message: 请尝试编辑和标注您的截图
tryEditingRequest.description: Try editing and annotating your screenshot

goPremiumHeader.message: 享受高级截图体验，选择“全页截图尊享版”
goPremiumHeader.description: Take your screenshots to the next level with Full Page Screen Capture Premium

goPremiumSubHeader.message: 包含高阶编辑和标注功能
goPremiumSubHeader.description: Including advanced editing and annotation features of screenshots

goPremiumLink.message: 开始体验（免费一周体验版）

appDesc.message: 完整可靠地捕获当前页面的屏幕截图-无需请求任何额外的权限！
appDesc.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:00:59] Capture a screenshot of your current page in entirety and reliably—without requesting any extra permissions!

_Anyoptionalpermissionsthatwerepreviousl.message: 之前授予的任何可选权限将在此处显示为选中状态。 您可以随时撤销它们。 如果将来再次需要他们，我们将重新提出请求。
_Anyoptionalpermissionsthatwerepreviousl.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:04] Any optional permissions that were previously granted will appear checked here. You can revoke them at any time. If they are needed again in the future, they will be re-requested.

_Areyousureyouwanttodelete1screencapture.message:
您确定要删除 1 个屏幕截图吗？
 （此操作无法撤消。）
_Areyousureyouwanttodelete1screencapture.description:
[aws:2019-09-23 03:01:05] Are you sure you want to delete 1 screencapture?
 (This action cannot be undone.)

_Areyousureyouwanttodeletecountscreencap.message:
您确定要删除 $count$ 屏幕截图吗？
 （此操作无法撤消。）
_Areyousureyouwanttodeletecountscreencap.description:
[aws:2019-09-23 03:01:06] Are you sure you want to delete $count$ screen captures?
 (This action cannot be undone.)

_Areyousureyouwanttodeletethisscreenshot.message:
您确定要删除此屏幕截图吗？
（此操作无法撤消。）
_Areyousureyouwanttodeletethisscreenshot.description:
[aws:2019-09-23 03:01:07] Are you sure you want to delete this screenshot?
(This action cannot be undone.)

_Areyousureyouwanttoresettotheextensions.message: 您确定要重置为扩展的原始主题默认值吗？
_Areyousureyouwanttoresettotheextensions.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:08] Are you sure you want to reset to the extension’s original theme defaults?

_Automaticallydownloadyourscreenshotinst.message: 自动下载您的屏幕截图，而不是在新窗口中打开它。这意味着扩展捕获选项卡将无法打开。 您可以通过右键单击扩展并选择 “选项” 返回此处。
_Automaticallydownloadyourscreenshotinst.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:10] Automatically download your screenshot instead of opening it in a new window.This means the extension capture tab will not open. You can return back here by right-clicking on the extension and selecting "Options".

_Automaticallyshowasaveasdialogwhendownl.message: 下载截图时自动显示 “另存为” 对话框。 如果在 Chrome 设置中启用了 “在下载前询问每个文件的保存位置” 选项，则优先考虑。
_Automaticallyshowasaveasdialogwhendownl.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:11] Automatically show a "save as" dialog when downloading your screenshots. If the “Ask where to save each file before downloading” option is enabled in your Chrome settings, then that takes priority.

_Backtocapturechangesareautosaved.message: 返回捕获（更改自动保存）

_Chromepreventsextensionsfromsavingfiles.message: Chrome 可防止扩展程序将文件保存到默认下载目录之外。 您输入的路径已相应更新。 对不起！
_Chromepreventsextensionsfromsavingfiles.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:20] Chrome prevents extensions from saving files outside of the default downloads directory. The path you entered has been updated accordingly. Sorry!

_Clickdraginlayerspane.message: 在图层窗格中单击 + 拖动

_ConfigureyoursettingsfortheFullPageScre.message: 为全页屏幕捕获扩展配置您的设置。 敬请关注进一步更新。 测试版设置将来可能会更改。
_ConfigureyoursettingsfortheFullPageScre.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:22] Configure your settings for the Full Page Screen Capture extension. Stay tuned for further updates. Beta settings may change in the future.

_ErrorhandlingfilesPleasereportthisviath.message: 处理文件时出错。 请通过上面的标志报告按钮进行报告。
_ErrorhandlingfilesPleasereportthisviath.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:42] Error handling files. Please report this via the flag reporting button above.

_Filenolongerexistsperhapsithasbeenclear.message: 文件不再存在-可能已从浏览器中清除
_Filenolongerexistsperhapsithasbeenclear.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:47] File no longer exists—perhaps it has been cleared from your browser

_Ifthispersistspleasereportitviatheflagr.message: 如果这种情况仍然存在，请通过上面的标志报告按钮进行报告。
_Ifthispersistspleasereportitviatheflagr.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:55] If this persists, please report it via the flag reporting button above.

_Ifyoudliketotrythisfeatureinthefuturecl.message: 如果您将来想尝试此功能，请点击顶部的 “编辑” 按钮。
_Ifyoudliketotrythisfeatureinthefuturecl.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:01:56] If you’d like to try this feature in the future, click on the “Edit” button up top.

_Lookforanelementwithinthepagewithitsown.message: 在页面中查找具有自己滚动条的元素，并在捕获过程中滚动该项目。
_Lookforanelementwithinthepagewithitsown.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:03] Look for an element within the page with its own scroll bars and scroll that item during the capture.

_Mightyouconsidertakingaminutetorateitin.message: 你可以考虑花一分钟在网上商店评分吗？
_Mightyouconsidertakingaminutetorateitin.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:04] Might you consider taking a minute to rate it in the Webstore?

_NoscreencapturesfoundGomakesome.message: 未找到屏幕截图。 去做一些！
_NoscreencapturesfoundGomakesome.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:08] No screen captures found. Go make some!

_OnMacChromethereareissueswithsaveasfora.message: 在 Mac Chrome 上，自动下载和下载多个文件时存在 “另存为” 的问题，因此在这些情况下它被禁用。
_OnMacChromethereareissueswithsaveasfora.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:13] On Mac Chrome there are issues with "save as" for auto-download and when downloading multiple files, so it is disabled in those scenarios.

_PNGislosslessandshouldmatchexactlywhati.message: PNG 是无损的，应该与屏幕上看到的内容完全匹配，但通常比使用压缩的 JPG 更大的文件大小。
_PNGislosslessandshouldmatchexactlywhati.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:22] PNG is lossless and should match exactly what is seen on the screen, but will usually have larger file sizes than JPG, which uses compression.

_Savethispermissionifacceptedforfutureca.message: 保存此权限（如果接受）以供将来捕获。 它仍然可以在稍后从选项页面撤销。
_Savethispermissionifacceptedforfutureca.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:31] Save this permission (if accepted) for future captures. It can still be revoked later from the options page.

_Select1ormorescreenshotstousethisaction.message: 选择 1 个或多个屏幕截图以使用此操作。
_Select1ormorescreenshotstousethisaction.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:34] Select 1 or more screenshots to use this action.

_Signupforafree7daytrialtounlocktheedito.message: 注册免费的 7 天试用版，解锁编辑器并下载您的杰作。
_Signupforafree7daytrialtounlocktheedito.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:38] Sign up for a free 7-day trial to unlock the editor and download your masterpiece.

_Somethingwentwrongdeletingyourscreensho.message: 删除您的屏幕截图出错。
_Somethingwentwrongdeletingyourscreensho.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:40] Something went wrong deleting your screenshot.

_Somethingwentwrongopeningthisscreenshot.message: 打开这个屏幕截图成一个新的出现了问题。
_Somethingwentwrongopeningthisscreenshot.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:40] Something went wrong opening this screenshot into a new.

_Sometimeselementslikeabacktotopbuttonor.message: 有时，像 “返回到顶部” 按钮或粘页脚等元素会在页面上重复。 这试图绝对定位它们以阻止它们在屏幕热线中重复。
_Sometimeselementslikeabacktotopbuttonor.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:41] Sometimes elements, like a “back to top” button or a sticky footer will repeat on the page. This tries to position them absolutely to stop them from repeating in a screeshot.

_Specifyadirectoryunderneathyourdownload.message: 在下载目录下指定一个目录以保存屏幕截图，例如 “屏幕截图”。 如果为空，则默认为下载目录。 （请将其限制为字母、数字、短划线、下划线和斜线-无效字符将被自动删除）。
_Specifyadirectoryunderneathyourdownload.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:43] Specify a directory underneath your downloads directory to save your screenshots, such as “screencaptures”. Defaults to the downloads directory if blank. (Please limit it to letters, numbers, dashes, underscores, and slashes—invalid characters will automatically be removed).

_SpecifytheformatsizeofPDFsforwhenexport.message: 指定导出为 PDF 时的 PDF 格式大小。
_SpecifytheformatsizeofPDFsforwhenexport.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:44] Specify the format size of PDFs for when exporting to PDF.

_ThankyouforsupportingFullPageScreenCapt.message: 感谢您支持全页屏幕截图
_ThankyouforsupportingFullPageScreenCapt.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:48] Thank you for supporting Full Page Screen Capture

_Thebestandsafestwaytocaptureascreenshot.message: 捕获整个网页屏幕截图的最佳和最安全的方式。
_Thebestandsafestwaytocaptureascreenshot.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:49] The best and safest way to capture a screenshot of an entire web page.

_Thedownloadpermissionisrequiredtoenable.message: 需要下载权限才能启用 PDF 格式下载功能。
_Thedownloadpermissionisrequiredtoenable.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:49] The download permission is required to enable the download as PDF feature.

_Thefollowingfilescouldnotbedownloaded.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:50] The following files could not be downloaded:

_Therewasanerrordownloadingfilespleasere.message: 下载文件时出错，请通过上面的标志按钮报告。
_Therewasanerrordownloadingfilespleasere.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:51] There was an error downloading files, please report it via the flag button above.

_Thesesettingswillapplytoallfutureeditso.message: 这些设置将应用于所有未来的屏幕截图编辑。 更改将自动保存。
_Thesesettingswillapplytoallfutureeditso.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:52] These settings will apply to all future edits of screenshots. Changes are autosaved.

_Thespecifiedimagecouldnotbefound.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:53] The specified image could not be found.

_ThisextensiontakesalotofworktomaintainI.message: 此扩展需要大量的工作来维护。 听到你觉得它有用真的很有意义！
_ThisextensiontakesalotofworktomaintainI.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:54] This extension takes a lot of work to maintain. It’s really meaningful to hear that you find it useful!

_ThisistakinglongertoloadthanexpectedHan.message: 这需要比预期更长的时间来加载。 挂紧！ 如果一段时间后没有任何更新，请通过上面的报告标志按钮报告。
_ThisistakinglongertoloadthanexpectedHan.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:54] This is taking longer to load than expected. Hang tight! If nothing updates after a while, please report this via the reporting flag button above.

_Thispermissionallowsgreatercontroloverh.message: 此权限允许更好地控制下载在扩展中的工作方式。 您的首选项已保存，此下载按钮现在将回退到默认的浏览器点击下载。 但是，系统仍会提示您输入此功能以便使用历史记录或选项页面上的任何高级功能，因为它们需要此权限才能工作。
_Thispermissionallowsgreatercontroloverh.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:56] This permission allows greater control over how downloads work within the extension. Your preference has been saved, and this download button will now fallback to default browser on-click downloads. However, you still be prompted for it in order to use any of the advanced features on the History or Options pages, since they need this permissions to work.

_Thispermissionisrequiredforthedownloadb.message: 下载按钮和自动下载功能需要此权限。
_Thispermissionisrequiredforthedownloadb.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:02:56] This permission is required for the download buttons and the auto-download feature.

_Thisscreenshotbeensuccessfullyremoved.message: 此屏幕截图已成功删除。

_WelcometotheFullPageEditor.message: 欢迎使用完整页面编辑器！
_WelcometotheFullPageEditor.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:03:08] Welcome to the Full Page Editor!

_WelcometotheofficialFullPageEditor.message: 欢迎来到官方的全页编辑器！
_WelcometotheofficialFullPageEditor.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:03:09] Welcome to the official Full Page Editor!

_Wereexcitedtohaveyouaboard.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:03:10] We’re excited to have you aboard.

_Wouldyouliketoreportanyissuesyoureexper.message: 您是否要报告您遇到的任何问题，以便我们可以一起改进此扩展？
_Wouldyouliketoreportanyissuesyoureexper.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:03:11] Would you like to report any issues you’re experiencing, so we can improve this extension together?

_Youneedtograntthedownloadprivilegeinord.message: 您需要授予下载权限才能下载文件
_Youneedtograntthedownloadprivilegeinord.description: [aws:2019-09-23 03:03:13] You need to grant the download privilege in order to download files

_AutodownloadisenabledYoucanchangethisin.message: 已启用自动下载功能。 您可以在选项中更改此 选项。
_AutodownloadisenabledYoucanchangethisin.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:41] Auto-download is enabled. You can change this in options.

_Cannotautodownloadyouneedtoreapprovethe.message: 无法自动下载，您需要重新批准 选项中的 “下载” 权限。
_Cannotautodownloadyouneedtoreapprovethe.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:42] Cannot auto-download, you need to reapprove the Downloads permission in options.

_ChromedoesnotallowaccesstosomeURLsforse.message: 出于安全原因，Chrome 不允许访问某些 URL。 这包括网上商店库、其他铬扩展和铬:// URL。 当前页面显示为受限 URL。
_ChromedoesnotallowaccesstosomeURLsforse.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:43] Chrome does not allow access to some URLs for security reasons. This includes the webstore gallery, other chrome extensions, and chrome:// URLs. The current page appears to be a restricted URL.

_Extrapermissionsarerequiredtoaccesstheu.message: 访问基础页面需要额外的权限。
_Extrapermissionsarerequiredtoaccesstheu.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:46] Extra permissions are required to access the underlying page.

_Foradditionalquestionsaidinvalidlinkdat.message: 如需其他问题， 请联系我们。
_Foradditionalquestionsaidinvalidlinkdat.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:48] For additional questions, contact us.

_NotethispageistoolargefortheChromebrows.message: 注意：此页面太大，Chrome 浏览器无法捕获为一张图像。 它将被分割成 多个 图像。
_NotethispageistoolargefortheChromebrows.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:49] Note: this page is too large for the Chrome browser to capture as one image. It will be split into multiple images.

_PleasegotoyourChromeextensionsettingsan.message: 请转到您的 Chrome 扩展设置并启用 “允许访问文件 URL”，以便扩展程序可以访问此页面。
_PleasegotoyourChromeextensionsettingsan.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:51] Please go to your Chrome extension settings and enable “Allow access to file URLs”, so the extension can access this page.

_SomethingwentwrongTryrefreshingthepagea.message:
出了什么问题 尝试刷新页面并再次运行。

如果这种情况仍然存在，请 联系我们。
_SomethingwentwrongTryrefreshingthepagea.description:
[aws:2019-09-23 19:22:52] Something went wrong. Try refreshing the page and running this again.

If this persists, please contact us.

_Thissiteappearstohaveembeddedcontentwit.message: 该网站似乎在 框架集中嵌入了内容。
_Thissiteappearstohaveembeddedcontentwit.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:53] This site appears to have embedded content within an a frameset.

_Thissiteappearstohaveembeddedcontentwit.message: 该网站似乎在 iframe中嵌入了内容。
_Thissiteappearstohaveembeddedcontentwit.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:54] This site appears to have embedded content within an iframe.

_ThistestversionhasexpiredPleasereachout.message: 此测试版本已过期。 请联系以获取更新或切换到 Chrome 网上商店中的适当扩展程序。
_ThistestversionhasexpiredPleasereachout.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:55] This test version has expired. Please reach out to get an update or switch over to the proper extension in the Chrome Web Store.

_Warningtheextensionisnotdesignedtohandl.message: 警告：扩展不是为了处理极大的捕获而设计的。 它可能无法完成此页面的捕获。
_Warningtheextensionisnotdesignedtohandl.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:56] Warning: the extension is not designed to handle extremely large captures. It might fail to complete a capture of this page.

_WelcometotheFullPageScreenCaptureextens.message: 欢迎使用全页屏幕捕获扩展。
_WelcometotheFullPageScreenCaptureextens.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:57] Welcome to the Full Page Screen Capture extension.

_Youcanrunthisonanywebpageexceptforonesw.message: 除了浏览器限制扩展运行脚本的网页之外，您可以在任何网页上运行此操作。 这包括 Chrome 网络商店、浏览器设置页面和其他扩展程序。
_Youcanrunthisonanywebpageexceptforonesw.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:58] You can run this on any webpage, except for ones where the browser restricts extensions from running scripts. This includes the Chrome web store, browser settings pages, and other extensions.

_Youmayneedtoreruntheextensionafterinter.message: 您可能需要在与对话框交互后重新运行扩展。 如果您取消，它将只捕获可见屏幕。
_Youmayneedtoreruntheextensionafterinter.description: [aws:2019-09-23 19:22:59] You may need to re-run the extension after interacting with the dialog. If you cancel, it will capture just the visible screen.
